entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 08:18 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.3°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -18.3°C
Wind: SW 35 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
